Package main.java.gui.util

Class IDE

java.lang.Object
main.java.gui.util.IDE
public class IDE extends Object
Manages the opening of a text editing tool/Integrated Development Environment in the user's native Operating System, with the aim of editing one or several files found in specific file paths.
Version:
May 2024
Author:
Adriana R.F. (uo282798@uniovi.es)

  • Method Details

    • open

      public static void open(JPanel frame, List<String> paths) throws ResourceException, IOException
      Opens and IDE for editing several files, in bulk.
      Parameters:
      frame - panel relative to which the IDE will be opened
      paths - list of the files to edit
      Throws:
      IOException - if text editing tool cannot be opened
      ResourceException - if one of the requested file paths does not exist

    • open

      public static void open(JPanel frame, String path) throws IdeException, ResourceException
      Opens and IDE for editing a file.
      Parameters:
      frame - panel relative to which the IDE will be opened
      path - of the file to edit
      Throws:
      IdeException - in case of issues opening text editing tool desktop
      ResourceException - in case that requested file path does not exist
